title: What is the importance of the news reporting and editing process? - Quora

response.answer_text: Real news — not the fake kind — is diligently reported by real, trained people under the guidance (some more heavy-handed than others) of other real, trained people, all of them dedicated to truth, justice and the American Way. Yes, that’s what we see in the mirror. There is much time, effort, questions and more questions. It’s really more of a calling or (as I joke) an addiction, which is why I refer to myself as a “recovering” journalist. We’re never completely cured.

The importance of the news reporting and editing process is definitely making sure that the facts are all there. You want to be sure that whoever you are trying to reach is getting all the facts possible in order to get the full story. You want build that kind of trust with your audience.
